prompts: Create a small, cute Pokemon with big ears and a playful personality.
Design a pink Pokemon with green accents that resembles a small mammal.
Show me a Pokemon that is timid but has a fierce fighting spirit.
Generate a creature that thrives in grasslands and has a vibrant color scheme.
Imagine a Pokemon that evolves into a stronger version but starts off as adorable.
Make a Pokemon that is known for its agility and clever strategies in battle.
Give me a description of a Pokemon with a distinct horn and large ears.
